name: Psychological Deprogramming Methods
description: Techniques to counteract ideological conditioning and restore independent thought.

cards.title: Identifying Thought Reform Mechanisms
cards.description: Understanding how cults manipulate perception and cognition.
bulletpoints: Breaking down neuro-linguistic programming (NLP) tactics used for indoctrination.
Recognizing loaded language and thought-stopping techniques.
Differentiating between influence, persuasion, and coercive control.

cards.title: Building Cognitive Resilience Against Cult Influence
cards.description: Strengthening mental defenses to prevent re-indoctrination.
bulletpoints: Developing critical thinking filters against cult rhetoric.
Using logic and self-inquiry to dismantle false narratives.
Enhancing emotional stability to resist psychological coercion.

cards.title: Intervention and Exit Strategies
cards.description: Safely guiding individuals out of cult environments.
bulletpoints: Engaging in dialogue without triggering defensive reactions.
Using Socratic questioning to create cognitive dissonance.
Providing post-cult rehabilitation for long-term recovery.
